speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is he. Who is calling?

speaker: Agent
text: My name is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I’m calling about your account. To verify your identity, could you please provide your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Could you also confirm your current address for me?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Elm Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you for verifying your information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $300. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I’d prefer to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: That’s perfectly fine. We can set up a plan over three months. Does that work for you?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I’ll send you the details via email. Can I confirm your email address is davis@email.com?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Davis. You will receive the email shortly. Have a great day!
